lines.i: Information on the estimated time of fetal death; the time of death is characterized by relationshp to the time of delivery.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.22"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:415)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:417)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:416)/@code="73811-2" Estimated time of fetal death (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:526)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - that it indicates the death of a fetus.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:418), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Fetal Death Time Point (NCHS) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7112 DYNAMIC (CONF:419)
Information regarding the point within the delivery process at which fetal death occurred.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:415)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:417)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:416)/@code="73811-2" Estimated time of fetal death (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:526)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - that it indicates the death of a fetus.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:418), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Fetal Death Time Point (NCHS) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7112 DYNAMIC (CONF:419)
Information regarding the point within the delivery process at which fetal death occurred.
